posts.message:
Guys, where would be the best place to find and reach out to people working in data analytics, or fullstack with interest in data analytics/science (strong in Python, etc) in Egypt? I know about EgyptianGeeks jobs page, any other recommended place? I am a Co-Founder of an early stage startup in Finland, and we are looking into hiring some people in Egypt, and who knows, open an office there soon..

I know that here is more for tech questions, but wasn't sure where to put that question! In a way, it's not a job post it's more consulting on where to find talents.

I want to access this api 
https://remoteok.io/index.json
from this site
https://microsmsm.github.io/GeeksJobs/

but I have a CORS error :
"XMLHttpRequest cannot load https://remoteok.io/index.json. No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'https://microsmsm.github.io' is therefore not allowed access."

is there a solution ?

Hello Geeks,
I have a question to the mac experts. Yesterday I downloaded and installed the Sierra 10.12.1 update after I was running 10.12, on my 13" mid-2014 macbook pro retina display. 
After the update, I couldn't select a resolution higher than 1680*1050 although my screen resolution is 2560 x 1600. it was working fine on 10.12.
Anyone can help, please :(

posts.caption: speakerdeck.com
posts.description: There are overlooked corners of our codebases. Ignored, unloved. Unimportant. Or so we thought. What once was inconsequential hasâ€”somehowâ€”grown into ghastly mess. This talk tells the story of one such mess, and the taming of it.
